title: Quick and easy Indian-style okra
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/4 teaspoon mustard seed', '1 pinch asafoetida powder', '1 medium onion, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, peeled and sliced', '1/4 teaspoon cumin seed', '1/8 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 large tomato, chopped', '450g sliced okra', '1/4 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon amchoor', 'salt to taste']
